title: NFTCar.io
author: NFTCar.io
content: We are also excited to introduce Carbon NFT trading, which incentivizes the removal of high-polluting cars from the market, leading to a reduction in CO2 emissions. By linking each Carbon NFT to a specific car's data, we offer a unique and trustworthy trading asset for individuals seeking to reduce their carbon footprint.As the market for Carbon NFT trading grows, we anticipate an increase in the number of high-polluting cars removed from circulation, ultimately contributing to a reduction in CO2 emissions and a more sustainable future. We believe that Carbon NFT trading represents a game-changer in the fight against climate change and are thrilled to offer this innovative solution to our users.We invite you to join us in this important mission to combat climate change and reduce air pollution. With Carbon NFTs and Carbon NFT trading, we can all take ownership of our carbon emissions and make a positive impact on the environment.We are excited to be at the forefront of this technology and look forward to the positive impact that Carbon NFTs will have on the environment.Leave your comments below. Do you think such NFTs could be a successful way to reduce carbon emissions, etc?

comments.author: @sriyan
comments.body: Quote from: NFTCar.io on April 26, 2023, 08:31:22 AMWe are also excited to introduce Carbon NFT trading, which incentivizes the removal of high-polluting cars from the market, leading to a reduction in CO2 emissions. By linking each Carbon NFT to a specific car's data, we offer a unique and trustworthy trading asset for individuals seeking to reduce their carbon footprint.As the market for Carbon NFT trading grows, we anticipate an increase in the number of high-polluting cars removed from circulation, ultimately contributing to a reduction in CO2 emissions and a more sustainable future. We believe that Carbon NFT trading represents a game-changer in the fight against climate change and are thrilled to offer this innovative solution to our users.We invite you to join us in this important mission to combat climate change and reduce air pollution. With Carbon NFTs and Carbon NFT trading, we can all take ownership of our carbon emissions and make a positive impact on the environment.We are excited to be at the forefront of this technology and look forward to the positive impact that Carbon NFTs will have on the environment.Leave your comments below. Do you think such NFTs could be a successful way to reduce carbon emissions, etc?The main problem of the NFTs is the liquidity problem. If you can use nft fractionalization to your carbon nft, then it will be better.

comments.author: Tytanowy Janusz
comments.body: And what will give value to these NFTs? Merely creating a token out of thin air does not make it have the value/power to change the environment.Same as with play-to-earn or move-to-earn tokens. People are excited to be paid to play, but they forget that it can't work because on the other hand, there would have to be someone willing to pay you to play.

comments.author: hugeblack
comments.body: I do not have a detailed knowledge of how NFT works, but let's take it on the basis, how you will make sure of the car information and the value of its interview, and what is the guarantor of the liquidity of that car.There are many ways to modify cars, but NFT cannot be modified, so how will these two variables be compatible.Finally, there is no unified global standard for carbon and the carbon market[1] that will happen on a global and not personal scale and if it happens on a personal scale, there are better ways than NFT, so what is the distinction of your service?[1] https://climatepromise.undp.org/news-and-stories/what-are-carbon-markets-and-why-are-they-important

comments.author: JeffBrad12
comments.body: I think that such thing will not be effective when it comes in reducing the carbon footprint mainly because if in every attempt of reducing carbon footprints is being recorded, it just gonna makes the ones that's trying reduce their carbon footprints sense of achievement and will reluctant in doing more.I also don't understand how it can be an asset, yea it will reduce the carbon footprint but most certainly it's not an asset, it will just acts like a certificate, and nothing more I even doubt it could ever have value. it just doesn't seem make sense to me at least with my limited understanding.

By linking each Carbon NFT to a specific car's data, we offer a unique and trustworthy trading asset for individuals seeking to reduce their carbon footprint.As the market for Carbon NFT trading grows, we anticipate an increase in the number of high-polluting cars removed from circulation, ultimately contributing to a reduction in CO2 emissions and a more sustainable future. We believe that Carbon NFT trading represents a game-changer in the fight against climate change and are thrilled to offer this innovative solution to our users.We invite you to join us in this important mission to combat climate change and reduce air pollution. With Carbon NFTs and Carbon NFT trading, we can all take ownership of our carbon emissions and make a positive impact on the environment.We are excited to be at the forefront of this technology and look forward to the positive impact that Carbon NFTs will have on the environment.Leave your comments below. Do you think such NFTs could be a successful way to reduce carbon emissions, etc?The main problem of the NFTs is the liquidity problem. If you can use nft fractionalization to your carbon nft, then it will be better. I guess NFTs dont have any logical liquidity solution. If any, then it's high risk.

comments.author: NFTCar.io
comments.body: Quote from: Tytanowy Janusz on April 30, 2023, 06:08:38 AMAnd what will give value to these NFTs? Merely creating a token out of thin air does not make it have the value/power to change the environment.Same as with play-to-earn or move-to-earn tokens. People are excited to be paid to play, but they forget that it can't work because on the other hand, there would have to be someone willing to pay you to play.NFTCar's innovative NFTs provide an effective solution to reduce your carbon footprint to zero. By purchasing high-pollution cars, scrapping them, and generating NFTs, carbon reduction is 100% verifiable. Each NFT marks the removal of 1 ton of CO2 at the cost of 80 USD per ton.  The value proposition is that even in 2030, you can verify that 1 NFT equals 1 ton of CO2 reduced in the year 2023.Games are for the games, and NFTCar NFTs are for those that wanna contribute a reduction of air pollution and reduce their carbon footprint to 0 from travelling, driving or owning real estate.

comments.author: BenCodie
comments.body: Quote from: NFTCar.io on May 01, 2023, 08:42:40 AMQuote from: Tytanowy Janusz on April 30, 2023, 06:08:38 AMAnd what will give value to these NFTs? Merely creating a token out of thin air does not make it have the value/power to change the environment.Same as with play-to-earn or move-to-earn tokens. People are excited to be paid to play, but they forget that it can't work because on the other hand, there would have to be someone willing to pay you to play.NFTCar's innovative NFTs provide an effective solution to reduce your carbon footprint to zero. By purchasing high-pollution cars, scrapping them, and generating NFTs, carbon reduction is 100% verifiable. Each NFT marks the removal of 1 ton of CO2 at the cost of 80 USD per ton.  The value proposition is that even in 2030, you can verify that 1 NFT equals 1 ton of CO2 reduced in the year 2023.Games are for the games, and NFTCar NFTs are for those that wanna contribute a reduction of air pollution and reduce their carbon footprint to 0 from travelling, driving or owning real estate. Please do not post consecutively more than once in a 24 hour period. If you want to reply to multiple posts, edit your previous post and put everything in one post.To reply to this thread, the idea is good but it is only good for the purpose of tracking data, as you said. Any speculation or trading is illogical. On the other hand, a betting/prediction system surrounding the NFTs and their data (i.e. predicting the evolution of a brand/make/model, its value, future data, etc) might be something that could add a monetary aspect in a logical way. Liquidity of the NFTs themselves on the other hand, that's something that you could only make successful with a very large amount of initial liquidity to distribute across all of the NFTs that you are using to track data. Another question is, if the NFTs are meant for tracking data, then how are they actually distributed? Following this, if they are distributed, then what purpose would there be in distributing them and holding them?

comments.author: NFTCar.io
comments.body: Quote from: hugeblack on April 30, 2023, 02:43:21 PMI do not have a detailed knowledge of how NFT works, but let's take it on the basis, how you will make sure of the car information and the value of its interview, and what is the guarantor of the liquidity of that car.There are many ways to modify cars, but NFT cannot be modified, so how will these two variables be compatible.Finally, there is no unified global standard for carbon and the carbon market[1] that will happen on a global and not personal scale and if it happens on a personal scale, there are better ways than NFT, so what is the distinction of your service?[1] https://climatepromise.undp.org/news-and-stories/what-are-carbon-markets-and-why-are-they-importantOur NFT comes with car VIN code and with 4 QR codes on the NFT:1- Proof of Advertisement - proof that the car has been bought from a public car sales website;2- Vehicle Possession Certificate - proof that the car has been removed from the government registry;3- Vehicle Scrapping Certificate - proof that the car has been scrapped and no parts have reused; 4 - Proof of scrapping - video proof of car scrapping;We are making standards for the carbon reduction NFTs. 1 NFT equals 1 ton of CO2 reduced. The carbon footprint of a car is dependent on various factors such as its age, mileage, and average fuel consumption. By estimating the amount of carbon dioxide (CO2) emissions that a car would produce over the next ten years, we can determine its overall impact on the environment. It's important to note that burning 1 liter of fuel results in the emission of 2.3 kilograms of carbon. Hence, we calculate the car's current carbon emissions and make projections for the next 10 years. Because the car has been scrapped, future carbon emissions has removed. What is the better way of removing all the high pollution cars from the city areas?

comments.author: Tytanowy Janusz
comments.body: Quote from: NFTCar.io on May 01, 2023, 08:42:40 AMcarbon reduction is 100% verifiable.How? How to prove that I actually bought and utilize a car?Quote from: NFTCar.io on May 01, 2023, 08:42:40 AMNFTCar's innovative NFTs provide an effective solution to reduce your carbon footprint to zero. By purchasing high-pollution cars, scrapping them, and generating NFTs, carbon reduction is 100% verifiable.Do you really think someone will spend 2k$ to buy a car just to destroy it just to get NFT? what is the reason why i should do this? I'm not talking about the environmental benefit because it's here and without your NFT. I say why worthless NFT would convince me.And if you want to say it's not worthless, then tell me what will give it value.

comments.author: el kaka22
comments.body: There will always be shilling in the crypto world and I will understand that, bitcointalk is not short of that and it happens. However, this is TRADING discussion, I am sorry but what are we talking about here that is related to trading? Yeah I got it, you are doing something that helps the world and kudos for at least trying, don't know if you can achieve anything at all, doubt that you would, but at the end of the day we are talking about trading here and this has nothing to do with trading.It needs to be relocated without a doubt to altcoin section and altcoin speculation even, in there it would get a lot more attention because this is regarding a coin and speculations about that as well, so it is not really that weird.

I guess people wanna understand before they wanna trade it. No?

comments.author: NFTCar.io
comments.body: Quote from: Tytanowy Janusz on May 01, 2023, 09:00:35 AMQuote from: NFTCar.io on May 01, 2023, 08:42:40 AMcarbon reduction is 100% verifiable.How? How to prove that I actually bought and utilize a car?Quote from: NFTCar.io on May 01, 2023, 08:42:40 AMNFTCar's innovative NFTs provide an effective solution to reduce your carbon footprint to zero. By purchasing high-pollution cars, scrapping them, and generating NFTs, carbon reduction is 100% verifiable.Do you really think someone will spend 2k$ to buy a car just to destroy it just to get NFT? what is the reason why i should do this? I'm not talking about the environmental benefit because it's here and without your NFT. I say why worthless NFT would convince me.And if you want to say it's not worthless, then tell me what will give it value.The main challenge we face is how to effectively remove highly polluting cars from our cities, as following the government's current plan will result in millions of these cars still on the road by 2040.Personally, I have committed to using up to 1% of our trading profits to buy back high-pollution cars and transform them into NFTs to address this issue. This approach has the potential to be highly effective, and investing in NFTCar NFTs with prices lower than APEs could be a more sensible option. I believe that buying back and transforming high-pollution cars into NFTs presents a promising solution to the issue of air pollution in our cities.I haven't bought APS-s, but I would love to trade those types of NFTs. With our NFTs, carbon reduction is 100% verifiable. Each NFT marks the removal of 1 ton of CO2 at the cost of 80 USD per ton.  Each NFT is tied to a specific car through its VIN for verification.Today there are billion spent to fight climate change, but nowhere can you follow the trace of spending or calculate real CO2 reduction. 90% of climate change-related projects are just scams as well.  I think that is kind of attractive for all the trading communities of the future. So, in the end, we need some solution to rely on and something we can verify.

comments.author: Flexystar
comments.body: NFT is not something that can effectively reduce the carbon emission because one its not something that is burdening the pollution the way let’s other crypto mining is affecting. It’s effect won’t be much. I’m not sure if this project is promote the pollution free mining or is it self contained project to drive NFT sells through carbon emission free technique. But yes, this is good initiative. However roadmap needs to be Far clearer than this post. We can have excellent projects like this but again there are few posts above me which are reasonable one. How do we know it’s carbon emissions free?

comments.author: hugeblack
comments.body: Quote from: NFTCar.io on May 01, 2023, 08:57:14 AMOur NFT comes with car VIN code and with 4 QR codes on the NFT:1- Proof of Advertisement - proof that the car has been bought from a public car sales website;2- Vehicle Possession Certificate - proof that the car has been removed from the government registry;3- Vehicle Scrapping Certificate - proof that the car has been scrapped and no parts have reused; 4 - Proof of scrapping - video proof of car scrapping;Since you do not cooperate with the authorities or there is a binding law to comply with such offers, - what prevents a person from providing false or inaccurate data? - What prevents you from tampering with the inclusion or removal of any NFTs because you are the one who sets the criteria for acceptance or rejection. - What is the benefit of NFTs here? I mean, wouldn't it be better to have a centralized service with a website, then the legal details would be easier because you would be responsible for any damage that occurred and managing everything would be easier.Unless the user alone can set the parameters without your consent, they are not NFTs.
